acceptance-criteria.criterion: Feed settings sheet allows toggling auto-play, captions, playback speed, preferred quality, and tag filters, persisting to Serverpod preferences. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-4.md#source-tree--file-directives]
Preferences update endpoint recalculates personalization configuration and returns effective settings plus algorithm being used. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-4.md#implementation-guide]

**ACCESSIBILITY CRITICAL**: Reduced motion preference turns off auto-play and enables static preview thumbnails; captions toggle persists for future videos. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-4.md#technology-stack]
UI surfaces blocked maker list with ability to add/remove; backend ensures blocked IDs excluded from subsequent feed responses. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-4.md#data-models]
Analytics event `feed_preferences_updated` fires with diff metadata and experiment variants, ensuring traceability in Segment. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-4.md#analytics--observability]

task.description: Create `feed_settings_sheet.dart` with sections for playback, personalization, blocked makers, and accessibility options.
Implement `update_feed_preferences_use_case.dart` to map form values to domain objects and call repository.
Update `VideoFeedBloc` to refresh feed state when preferences change and to adjust preload strategy accordingly.
Extend `feed_endpoint.dart` and `feed_service.dart` to persist `FeedConfiguration` entity, storing blocked makers and quality preferences.
Update recommendation payloads to include user-configured tags and blocked makers.
Emit Segment + Datadog events for preference updates, capturing diff, algorithm, and session IDs.
Ensure accessibility toggles recorded for WCAG reporting dashboard.
